description: Try our easy to follow Gluten-Free Banoffee Pancakes recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Pancake,Pescatarian,Seafood free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Sesame free,Mother's Day,Quick & easy dessert,Halal,Wheat free,Vegetarian,Peanut free
name: Gluten-Free Banoffee Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 3 bananas, peeled, sliced on the diagonal
375g free from gluten buttermilk pancake shaker

recipeInstructions.text: Make pancakes according to packet instructions.

Heat a barbecue flat plate and grill plate over medium heat. Grease flat plate with a little oil. To cook pancakes, spoon 1/4 cupfuls of batter on to flat plate and cook for 2 minutes on each side or until golden.
Brush sliced banana with a little vegetable oil and then brush with maple syrup. Cook on grill plate of barbecue for 1-2 minutes each side, or until golden and softened.
Serve pancakes topped with grilled banana and drizzled with caramel sauce.
